original_text: therefore tell those who cover it with whitewash that it is going to fall. Rain will come in torrents, and I will send hailstones hurtling down, and violent winds will burst forth.
korean_text: 그러므로 너는 회칠하는 자에게 이르기를 그것이 무너지리라 폭우가 내리며 큰 우박덩이가 떨어지며 폭풍이 몰아치리니

sentences.original_text: therefore tell those who cover it with whitewash
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 그것을 흰회칠로 덮는 자들에게 말하라

sentences.original_text: that it is going to fall
and I will send hailstones hurtling down
and violent winds will burst forth
